author: Kim Lyons
title: Microsoft launches ‘Plasma Bot’ to recruit recovered COVID-19 patients to help treat sick ones
description: As part of its work with the CoVIg-19 Plasma Alliance, Microsoft is launching a self-screening tool for people to check whether they qualify to donate their plasma to create a treatment for those who have COVID-19.
content:
